input.sentences: [female] was trying to figure out the last ingredient to [female] 's secret sauce .
turns out its a slice of green pepper and tadaa | the best chips and dip ever !
after we ate the chips we played flip cup and of course my team won .
[female] celebrate by attempting to breakdance in the living room which only caused damage to the book shelf .
and then this guy from organization organization showed up because he lived next door . party hearty i guess .
output.sentences: We are having a party and I made my favorite secret sauce with my favorite ingredients.
My favorite sauce has sliced peppers and tomatoes.
We played flip the quarter in teams..
We had the living room decorated with cool stuff on the shelves.
The party was well organized considering this is where we live.
